name: Satisfactory
about_game: Satisfactory is a first-person open-world factory building game with a dash of exploration and combat. As an employee of FICSIT Inc., your mission is to explore an alien planet, map out its resources, and build massive, multi-story factories to automate production. Conveyor belts, trains, and pipes are your tools to conquer nature and create industrial perfection.

requirements.minimum: OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit) | CPU: i5-3570 3.4 GHz | RAM: 8GB | GPU: GTX 1650 / GTX 1050-ti
requirements.recommended: OS: Windows 11 (64-Bit) | CPU: Ryzen 5 5600X / i5-12400 | RAM: 16GB | GPU: RTX 2070 / RX 5700
